italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:1 CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) and italic-c POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:dagger POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:1 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
c_{k}=\left(\begin{array}[]{cc}0&1\\ 0&0\end{array}\right)\,\,{\rm and}\,\,\,c^{\dagger}_{k}=\left(\begin{array}[]{% cc}0&0\\ 1&0\end{array}\right),

italic-y RELOP:equals OPEN:langle italic-zeta VERTBAR:| SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-c POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:dagger POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end VERTBAR:| italic-zeta CLOSE:rangle PERIOD:.
y=\langle\zeta|\sum_{k=1}^{n^{\prime}-2}c^{\dagger}_{k}c_{k+1}|\zeta\rangle.

italic-H RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:dagger POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:dagger POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
H=-\sum_{k=1}^{n^{\prime}-2}(c_{k}^{\dagger}c_{k+1}+c_{k+1}^{\dagger}c_{k}),
italic-C RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-n ARG:end OPEN:langle italic-zeta VERTBAR:| italic-H VERTBAR:| italic-zeta CLOSE:rangle PERIOD:.
C=-\frac{1}{n}\langle\zeta|H|\zeta\rangle.

italic-b POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:, ID:ldots PUNCT:, italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:proportional-to caligraphic-A OPEN:[ TRIGFUNCTION:sine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-pi italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) TRIGFUNCTION:sine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-pi italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) ID:cdots TRIGFUNCTION:sine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-p italic-pi italic-k POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) CLOSE:] PERIOD:.

b_{k_{1},\ldots,k_{p}}\propto{\mathcal{A}}\Big{[}\sin\Big{(}\frac{\pi k_{p}}{n% ^{\prime}}\Big{)}\sin\Big{(}\frac{2\pi k_{p-1}}{n^{\prime}}\Big{)}\cdots\sin% \Big{(}\frac{p\pi k_{1}}{n^{\prime}}\Big{)}\Big{]}.

italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-m italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:, italic-m RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 PUNCT:, ID:ldots PUNCT:, italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 PERIOD:.
E_{m}=-2\cos\Big{(}\frac{m\pi}{n^{\prime}}\Big{)},\,\,m=1,\ldots,n^{\prime}-1.

italic-C RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-n ARG:end OPEN:langle italic-zeta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end VERTBAR:| italic-H VERTBAR:| italic-zeta POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:rangle RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ARG:start italic-n ARG:end SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-m italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
C=-\frac{1}{n}\langle\zeta_{0}|H|\zeta_{0}\rangle=\frac{2}{n}\sum_{m=1}^{p}% \cos\Big{(}\frac{m\pi}{n^{\prime}}\Big{)}.

italic-C RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-n ARG:end OPEN:[ FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( italic-p italic-pi MULOP:divide italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( OPEN:( italic-p ADDOP:plus NUMBER:1 CLOSE:) italic-pi MULOP:divide italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( italic-pi MULOP:divide italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus TRIGFUNCTION:cosine OPEN:( italic-pi MULOP:divide italic-n POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) ARG:end CLOSE:] PERIOD:.
C=\frac{1}{n}\Bigg{[}\frac{\cos(p\pi/n^{\prime})-\cos((p+1)\pi/n^{\prime})+% \cos(\pi/n^{\prime})-1}{1-\cos(\pi/n^{\prime})}\Bigg{]}.

italic-C POSTSUBSCRIPT:start lim POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ARG:start italic-pi ARG:end OPEN:( NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-alpha CLOSE:) TRIGFUNCTION:sine OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-alpha italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-alpha ARG:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
C_{\rm lim}=\frac{2}{\pi}(1-\alpha)\sin\Big{(}\frac{\alpha\pi}{1-\alpha}\Big{)}.

TRIGFUNCTION:tangent OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-alpha italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-alpha ARG:end CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-pi ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-alpha ARG:end PUNCT:,
\tan\Big{(}\frac{\alpha\pi}{1-\alpha}\Big{)}=\frac{\pi}{1-\alpha},

italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals italic-h OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-square-root ARG:start NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus italic-C POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
E_{f}=h\bigg{(}\frac{1+\sqrt{1-C^{2}}}{2}\bigg{)},
